short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a short summary of video content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Video Summarization extension provides a brief summary of the video being watched by the viewer. It looks at the youtube transcript if available in order to summarize the video.
